original_title: SLT-MOBITEL signs agreement with Cool Planet to power fashion chain’s new complex with SLT-MOBITEL Fibre
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider, signed an agreement recently with Cool Planet (Pvt) Ltd, one of the Sri Lanka’s leading fashion chains, to power its new unique complex in Nugegoda with SLT-MOBITEL Fibre.

The agreement was signed by Pushpakumara Samarasinghe, General Manager-Consumer Business Support, SLT and Rizwi Thaha, Chief Executive Officer, Cool Planet (Pvt) Ltd., recently with representatives from both organisations present at the event.

The new Nugegoda complex of Cool Planet (Pvt) Ltd., comprising over 51,000 square feet, in 3 floors, will house a diverse array of products in variety of fashion, accessories, Cosmetics, Stationery and Homeware evoking the brand’s essence of affordable. The complex is a part of Cool Planet’s integrative merchandising and innovative strategies to deliver an elevated design and luxurious experience to its customer base.

SLT-MOBITEL will provide Fibre technology throughout the complex enabling customers to experience smart building solutions. SLT-MOBITEL Fibre with Ultrafast speeds and connectivity will facilitate a pleasant shopping experience for customers. The complex can leverage fibre technology to enhance point of sales, inventory management and communication throughout the store and also to augment security.
With SLT-MOBITEL fibre solutions, customers and in-store employees will enjoy lightning-fast speeds without compromise and fibre-fuelled broadband with a difference.
